properties.entry: SELECT role, usid FROM role_usid ORDER BY role, usid LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT role, usid FROM role_usid WHERE role = ? AND usid = ?
SELECT count(usid) FROM role_usid WHERE role = ?
SELECT usid FROM role_usid WHERE role = ?
SELECT count(role) FROM role_usid WHERE usid = ?
SELECT role FROM role_usid WHERE usid = ?
SELECT usid FROM role_usid WHERE role = ? ORDER BY usid, role LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
